other_tests.findings: Severe impairment in NHEJ-mediated repair of double-stranded DNA breaks observed in fibroblasts from Patient 1 (P1).
Normal fasting glucose in both patients with significant insulin resistance; marked elevated fasting insulin levels.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient 1 (P1) diagnosed with diabetes at age 27; Patient 2 (P2) exhibited multiple elevated fasting blood sugars as an adult.

other_tests.findings: Homozygous variant c.246T/G in XRCC4 gene confirmed in both patients.
Aberrant splicing leading to an in-frame deletion of 23 amino acids in XRCC4 due to the c.246T/G variant.
Fibroblasts from Patient 1 demonstrated a DNA damage repair defect.
Jejunal wall tumor (5 cm in diameter) diagnosed as a gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST).
other_tests.changes_over_time: At age 31, Patient 2 developed diffuse intra-abdominal metastases.
